00 dark:border-zinc-800">to_number(str)Convert to numberto_number("42") = 42

String Concatenation

greeting = "Hello, " + name + "!"

Type Functions

FunctionDescriptionExample
type(val)Get type nametype(42) = "number"
to_string(val)Convert to stringto_string(true) = "true"
to_number(str)Parse numberto_number("3.14") = 3.14

Utility Functions

FunctionDescriptionExample
print(...)Print without newlineprint("hi")
println(...)Print with newlineprintln("hi")
range(n)List 0 to n-1range(3) = [0,1,2]
time()Unix timestamptime()
clock()High-res time in secondsclock()

Comparison
OperatorDescriptionExample
==Equal5 == 5 = true
!=Not equal5 != 3 = true
<Less than3 < 5 = true
>Greater than5 > 3 = true
<=Less or equal3 <= 3 = true
>=Greater or equal5 >= 5 = true

OperatorDescriptionExample
andLogical ANDtrue and false = false

Core Language Reference

Variables

Variables are dynamically typed and do not need declaration:

x = 42
name = "Player"
is_alive = true
items = []

Data Types
